骨髓化生不良相關變化之急性骨髓性白血病: acute myeloid leukemia with myelodysplasia-related changes

新生兒異體免疫性溶血性貧血: alloimmune hemolytic disease of the newborn {=HDN}

國際血液暨骨髓移植研究中心: Center for International Blood and Marrow Transplant Research {=CIBMTR}

競爭性等位基因特異性TaqMan探針PCR: competitive allele specific TaqMan PCR {=CAST PCR}

雙色素原位雜交: DISH {dual color chromogenic in situ hybridization}

基質輔助雷射脫附游離飛行時間質譜測定法: MALDI-TOF (matrix assisted laser desorption ionization time-of-flight) mass spectrometry

多點位可變數目縱排重複序列分析: multiple-locus variable number tandem repeat analysis {=MLVA}

即時聚合酶連鎖反應: real-time polymerase chain reaction {= real-time PCR；RT-PCR}

風險管理態勢分析法: strength, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats (SWOT) analysis

兒童EB病毒陽性T細胞淋巴增生病變: EBV-positive T cell lymphoproliferative disorder of childhood

唐氏症相關骨髓性白血病: myeloid leukemia associated with Down syndrome

非刪除型泛細胞遺傳性胎兒血紅素持續症: nondeletional pancellular hereditary persistence of fetal hemoglobin

瑞士型遺傳性胎兒血紅素持續症: Swiss-type hereditary persistence of fetal hemoglobin

WHIM症候群: WHIM (warts, hypogammaglobulinemia, infection, and myelokathexis) syndrome

歐洲抗微生物感受性試驗委員會: European Committee on Antimicrobial Susceptibility Testing {=EUCAST}

結外緣帶B細胞淋巴瘤: extranodal marginal zone B cell lymphoma

結外鼻腔型NK/T細胞淋巴瘤: Extranodal NK/T cell lymphoma, nasal type

家族性甲狀腺髓質癌: familial medullary carcinoma of the thyroid

螢光二維差異凝膠電泳: fluorescent two dimensional difference gel electrophoresis

HACEK群細菌: HACEK bacteria {Haemophilus species, Aggregatibacter species, Cardiobacterium hominis, Eikenella corrodens, and Kingella species}

健康保險可攜性與責任法案: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act {=HIPAA}

胰管內乳頭狀黏液性腫瘤: intraductal papillary-mucinous neoIntraductal papillary mucinous neoplasm {=IPMN} of the pancreas

美國醫療衛生機構認證聯合委員會: Joint Commission on Accreditation of Healthcare Organization {=JCAHO}

成熟T細胞與自然殺手細胞腫瘤: mature T cell and natural killer cell neoplasm

MELD分數: MELD score {Model For End-Stage Liver Disease}

單株輕鏈與重鏈沉積性疾病: monoclonal light and heavy chain deposition disease

骨髓系與淋巴系腫瘤合併嗜酸性白血球增多症: myeloid and lymphoid neoplasms with eosinophilia {=MLNE}

國家標準技術研究院: National Institute of Standards and Technology {=NIST}

原發性縱膈腔大B細胞淋巴瘤: primary mediastinal large B cell lymphoma

增殖細胞核抗原多蛋白複合物: proliferating cell nuclear antigen multiprotein complex
